appetizers.name: avocado rolls
appetizers.description: Deep fried eggwarap cheese melt with avocado and tomato

appetizers.name: wings
appetizers.description: Seasoned wings, dipped in batter and egg, deepfired and tossed in hot buffalo sause.

cold sandwiches.name: turkey sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Toasted whole grain bread, topped with lattuce, tomatoe, cheese of your choice, cold turkey slices and bacon bits

cold sandwiches.name: cranberry-walnut chicken salad sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Cold chicken salad with walnuts and cranberries, finely chopped celery, mayo, ranch seasoning

hot sandwiches.name: chipotel chicken avocado melt
hot sandwiches.description: Grilled panini with chicken, chipotle peppers, avocado and cheese

hot sandwiches.name: grilled cheese
hot sandwiches.description: Grilled sourdough on mayo and butter spread, with cheese of your choice. May add meats.

desserts.name: cupcakes
desserts.description: Chocolate cake base cupcake topped with cream cheese frosting and oreo crumle

drinks.name: coffee
drinks.description: Freshly brewed colombian black coffee, with fresh sweet cream and sugar to liking

drinks.name: tea
drinks.description: Tea of your choice, add sugar or honey, pour over frozen berries for a chilled taste.

drinks.name: lemonade
drinks.description: TFreshly squeezed Californian lemons, with organic cane sugar and fresh Alpine water.
